shortdesc.ph: Used to configure audio and video parameters for screen sharing.
Used to configure screen sharing functionality.

pd.note: Due to system limitations, system audio capture is only supported on Android API level 29 and above (i.e., Android 10+). To improve the success rate of capturing system audio during screen sharing, ensure that you call the method and set the audio scenario to AUDIO_SCENARIO_GAME_STREAMING.
